verses.verse: Hear, <WH8085> Israel: <WH3478> you are to pass over <WH5674> the Jordan <WH3383> this day, <WH3117> to go in <WH935> to dispossess <WH3423> nations <WH1471> greater <WH1419> and mightier <WH6099> than yourself, <WH5892> cities great <WH1419> and fortified up <WH1219> to the sky, <WH8064>

a people <WH5971> great <WH1419> and tall, <WH7311> the sons <WH1121> of the Anakim, <WH6062> whom you know, <WH3045> and of whom you have heard <WH8085> say, <WH3320> "Who can stand before <WH6440> the sons <WH1121> of Anak? <WH6061>"

Know <WH3045> therefore this day, <WH3117> that Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> is he who goes over <WH5674> before <WH6440> you as a devouring <WH398> fire; <WH784> he will destroy <WH8045> them, <WH3665> and he will bring them down before you: <WH6440> so you shall drive them out, <WH3423> and make them to perish <WH6> quickly, <WH4118> as Yahweh <WH3068> has spoken to you. <WH1696>

Don't <WH559> say in your heart, <WH3824> after Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> has thrust them out <WH1920> from before <WH6440> you, <WH559> saying, "For my righteousness <WH6666> Yahweh <WH3068> has brought me in <WH935> to possess <WH3423> this land; <WH776>" because Yahweh <WH3068> drives them out <WH3423> before <WH6440> you because of the wickedness <WH7564> of these nations. <WH1471>

Not for your righteousness, <WH6666> or for the uprightness <WH3476> of your heart, <WH3824> do you go <WH935> in to possess <WH3423> their land; <WH776> but for the wickedness <WH7564> of these nations <WH1471> Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> does drive them out <WH3423> from before <WH6440> you, <WH6965> and that he may establish the word <WH1697> which Yahweh <WH3068> swore <WH7650> to your fathers, <WH1> to Abraham, <WH85> to Isaac, <WH3327> and to Jacob. <WH3290>

Know <WH3045> therefore, <WH3068> that Yahweh your God <WH430> doesn't <WH5414> give you this good <WH2896> land <WH776> to possess <WH3423> it for your righteousness; <WH6666> for you are a stiff-necked <WH6203> people. <WH5971>

Remember, <WH2142> don't <WH7911> forget, how you provoked Yahweh <WH3068> your God <WH430> to wrath <WH7107> in the wilderness: <WH4057> from <WH4480> the day <WH3117> that you went forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> until you came <WH935> to this place, <WH4725> you have been rebellious <WH4784> against <WH5973> Yahweh. <WH3068>
Also in Horeb <WH2722> you provoked <WH7107> Yahweh <WH3068> to wrath, <WH7107> and Yahweh <WH3068> was angry <WH599> with you to destroy you. <WH8045>

When I was gone up <WH5927> onto the mountain <WH2022> to receive <WH3947> the tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> which Yahweh <WH3068> made <WH3772> with you, <WH3427> then I stayed on the mountain <WH2022> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights; <WH3915> I neither ate <WH398> bread <WH3899> nor drank <WH8354> water. <WH4325>

Yahweh <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> to me the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone <WH68> written <WH3789> with the finger <WH676> of God; <WH430> and on them were all the words <WH1697> which Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> with you on the mountain <WH2022> out of the midst <WH8432> of the fire <WH784> in the day <WH3117> of the assembly. <WH6951>

It came to pass at the end <WH7093> of forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights, <WH3915> that Yahweh <WH3068> gave <WH5414> me the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of stone, <WH68> even the tables <WH3871> of the covenant. <WH1285>

Yahweh <WH3068> said <WH559> to me, <WH6965> "Arise, get down <WH3381> quickly <WH4118> from here; <WH5971> for your people whom you have brought out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714> have corrupted <WH7843> themselves; <WH4118> they have quickly turned aside <WH5493> out of the way <WH1870> which I commanded <WH6680> them; <WH6213> they have made them a molten image. <WH4541>"
Furthermore Yahweh <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to me, <WH559> saying, "I have seen <WH7200> this people, <WH5971> and behold, <WH6203> it is a stiff-necked people: <WH5971>

let me alone, <WH7503> that I may destroy <WH8045> them, <WH4229> and blot out their name <WH8034> from under the sky; <WH8064> and I will make <WH6213> of <WH854> you a nation <WH1471> mightier <WH6099> and greater than they. <WH7227>"

So I turned <WH6437> and came down <WH3381> from the mountain, <WH2022> and the mountain <WH2022> was burning <WH1197> with fire: <WH784> and the two <WH8147> tables <WH3871> of the covenant <WH1285> were in my two <WH8147> hands. <WH3027>

I looked, <WH7200> and behold, <WH2398> you had sinned against Yahweh <WH3068> your God; <WH430> you had made <WH6213> yourselves a molten <WH4541> calf: <WH5695> you had turned aside <WH5493> quickly <WH4118> out of the way <WH1870> which Yahweh <WH3068> had commanded you. <WH6680>
I took <WH8610> hold of the two <WH8147> tables, <WH3871> and cast <WH7993> them out of <WH5921> my two <WH8147> hands, <WH3027> and broke <WH7665> them before your eyes. <WH5869>

I fell down <WH5307> before <WH6440> Yahweh, <WH3068> as at the first, <WH7223> forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights; <WH3915> I neither ate <WH398> bread <WH3899> nor drank <WH8354> water; <WH4325> because of all your sin <WH2403> which you sinned, <WH2398> in doing <WH6213> that which was evil <WH7451> in the sight <WH5869> of Yahweh, <WH3068> to provoke him to anger. <WH3707>

For I was afraid <WH3025> of <WH6440> the anger <WH639> and hot displeasure, <WH2534> with which Yahweh <WH3068> was angry <WH7107> against you to destroy <WH8045> you. <WH3068> But Yahweh listened <WH8085> to me that time also. <WH6471>
Yahweh <WH3068> was very <WH3966> angry <WH599> with Aaron <WH175> to destroy <WH8045> him: <WH6419> and I prayed for Aaron <WH175> also at the same time. <WH6256>

I took <WH3947> your sin, <WH2403> the calf <WH5695> which you had made, <WH6213> and burnt <WH8313> it with fire, <WH784> and stamped <WH3807> it, <WH2912> grinding it very small, <WH3190> until it was as fine <WH1854> as dust: <WH6083> and I cast <WH7993> its dust <WH6083> into the brook <WH5158> that descended out <WH3381> of the mountain. <WH2022>
At Taberah, <WH8404> and at Massah, <WH4532> and at Kibroth Hattaavah, <WH6914> you provoked Yahweh <WH3068> to wrath. <WH7107>

When Yahweh <WH3068> sent <WH7971> you from Kadesh Barnea, <WH6947> saying, <WH559> "Go up <WH5927> and possess <WH3423> the land <WH776> which I have given <WH5414> you; <WH4784>" then you rebelled against the commandment <WH6310> of Yahweh <WH3068> your God, <WH430> and you didn't <WH539> believe him, <WH8085> nor listen to his voice. <WH6963>
You have been rebellious <WH4784> against Yahweh <WH3068> from the day <WH3117> that I knew you. <WH3045>

So I fell down <WH5307> before <WH6440> Yahweh <WH3068> the forty <WH705> days <WH3117> and forty <WH705> nights <WH3915> that I fell down, <WH5307> because Yahweh <WH3068> had said <WH559> he would destroy you. <WH8045>

I prayed <WH6419> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> "Lord <WH3068> Yahweh, <WH3068> don't <WH7843> destroy your people <WH5971> and your inheritance, <WH5159> that you have redeemed <WH6299> through your greatness, <WH1433> that you have brought out <WH3318> of Egypt <WH4714> with a mighty <WH2389> hand. <WH3027>

Remember <WH2142> your servants, <WH5650> Abraham, <WH85> Isaac, <WH3327> and Jacob; <WH3290> don't <WH6437> look to the stubbornness <WH7190> of this people, <WH5971> nor to their wickedness, <WH7562> nor to their sin, <WH2403>

lest the land <WH776> you brought us out <WH3318> from say, <WH559> <WH3068> 'Because Yahweh was not able <WH3201> to bring <WH935> them into the land <WH776> which he promised <WH1696> to them, <WH8135> and because he hated them, <WH3318> he has brought them out to kill <WH4191> them in the wilderness. <WH4057>'
Yet they are your people <WH5971> and your inheritance, <WH5159> which you brought out <WH3318> by your great <WH1419> power <WH3581> and by your outstretched <WH5186> arm. <WH2220>"
